Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: He let me tasted two different wines. Food was great not hyper or crazy about it . I had to add salt.  It did taste great. Not sure about sea salt for food. Regular salt is fine.

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: Ended up here by accident, but had a lovely experience! Food was absolutely delicious, though portions were rather small.

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text:
If your looking for a authentic Italian environment in the center of Amsterdam this is the place to be.
The food is good enough to come back for but I wasn't blown away.
I did appreciate the fact that you really taste that they use fresh ingredients!

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: I have been here a couple of times and the restaurant deserves a good review. The interior feels warm like home. The service is good and personal. It is nice to receive a warm welcome by the staff as soon as you enter the restaurant. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: Good atmosphere, good service for being in Netherlands, and live music in the weekends. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: Great location that is easy to reach via public transport. Well prepared authentic Italian dishes at very reasonable prices. Real table linen vs plastic. Very attentive service. In summary - a gem!

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: This place was absolutely dead - no customers, no staff, but everywhere was jam packed. Although we had to shout a few times for staff to appear, the food was beyond incredibly tasty. We did get forgotten about when it got busy, to the ‚Ä¶

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: What a great service! Staff is very friendly and our meals were quite lovely. Especially our starter which was a royal mix of seafood, meat and typical Italian anti pasti. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: Top restaurant, really really Italian! Italian chef, great quality, it's the best Italian restaurant I've ever found abroad. Excellent price/quality balance and very nice guys serving you. Highly reccomended

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: Fancy decorated but the hosts were a bit clumsy making it all feel a bit awkward. Proportions were small and without side dishes, forcing you to spent a lot more or leave with an empty stomach. Maybe a good place for a very extensive meal if you have a budget, otherwise I would not recommend it.

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: The understated atmosphere belies the excellence in food and service. The waiter was attentive and meticulous. Food was fantastic....great portions, great preparation. Don't miss this hidden gem.

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: Lovely place. Family-owned restaurant by Italians from Sicily. Great typical Italian food, wonderful interior decor, friendly service. Highly recommended!

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: One of the best tiramisu, ever !

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: We sat down outside for the mushroom risotto (of the day) and really enjoyed it. I highly recommend venturing here for a meal. You won't regret it!

Name: La Storia della Vita
Review Text: I recently went to La Storia della Vita with a friend. I really enjoyed my dinner in there, the portions were small, but the service was great and the food was delicious! :)
